files.patch:
@@ -47,1 +47,1 @@
-Some of the implementations are inspired on the excellent blog from [Simon Boehm](https://siboehm.com/articles/22/CUDA-MMM), who applied a set of CUDA optimizations for the SGEMM algorithm to be able to run as close as cuBLAS (native GPU library for linear algebra) as possible. 
+Some implementations are inspired on the excellent blog from [Simon Boehm](https://siboehm.com/articles/22/CUDA-MMM), who applied a set of CUDA optimizations for the SGEMM algorithm to be able to run as close as cuBLAS (native GPU library for linear algebra) as possible.
